newstopspace.label: Popup Top Position
newstopspace.comment: Distance between top of the screen and popup, in px

newslinkclass.label: Newsletter link class/identifier
newslinkclass.comment: Please, enter link class name for example '.newsletter' or link identifier for example '#newsletter' for popup launch after link with this class or id 'click'

newspopupdelay.label: Popup Timing
newspopupdelay.comment: delay in seconds(for example "3") after page load

multiplesubscriptionguest.label: Multiple guest subscription
multiplesubscriptionguest.comment: if a GUEST (NOT LOGGED IN) customer is already subscribed to the newsletter and he tries to sign up again it works

newsiconstyle.label: Use standard icon colors
newsiconstyle.comment: Use red for Youtube icon, blue for Facebook icon, etc.
